column5: 4 Bedrooms 3.5 Baths Sleeps 10 This cottage brings the beach to your front door! The downstairs living room has a flat screen TV and DVD player. Fully stocked kitchen offers dining for 8. Downstairs bedroom offers a second living area with TV and private bath. Upstairs is the master bedroom with a king bed and a private bathroom. The middle bedroom offers a queen bed and the third a twin over full bunk bed. Relax and enjoy your favorite beverage on your own private wood deck. Community pool.
column8: DANCING STARFISH COTTAGE** STEPS AWAY FROM POOL!
